title: IAA Tonight | Jimmy G to Remain in San Fran AND Buffalo Bills Preview
description: QB Jimmy Garoppolo has agreed to a restructured one-year deal to stay with the San Francisco 49ers.The contract includes a no-trade clause and a no-tag clause. The compensation is reportedly $6.5 million fully guaranteed, with another potential $9.5 million in bonuses. Could Jimmy G's presence rattle Trey Lance's confidence if he starts off poorly? Plus, we preview the Buffalo Bills season. Who's the important player on their roster?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Brandon Marshall, Adam Pacman Jones, Leger Douzable, Omar Kelly)
